channel.title: Looking for people to redesign a website using WS and PHP
channel.description:
Well what i want to do is make a site with information of servers and has webclients and forums It will bill based on the runescape website not the look but the whole server select logic and navigation code These are the people i need Forum designer- (not just use smf but to make a new theme) Server select redisgner - (someone who knows .ws files to remake the server select page) Graphics designer- (make new graphics and stuff) Webclient coder- (make a webclient) Server status- (make a server status page that monitors health of the servers) Highscores- (make a script that mointors the top 10 players for each server)
If you have another idea that you think you can put on the site just PM me

item.title: Looking for people to redesign a website using WS and PHP
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

welshy:

Why would anyone make a freaking website for gay private servers

The same reason you made one for gay graphics.

Not ^ i don’t mean that im basically saying people are like different things you can’t really get up them for liking something you don’t.
